name: Dinari HOOD
description: Dinari HOOD dShares (HOOD.d) are part of Dinari’s broader mission to tokenize real-world assets, enabling 1:1 backed tokens for stocks, ETFs, and other financial products. HOOD.d specifically represents ownership of shares in Robinhood Markets, Inc., securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, Dinari’s dShares provide enhanced access to traditional equities with features like fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and improved liquidity, bridging the gap between traditional and digital finance.
